amendment.description: To prohibit the expenditure of Federal funds to enforce the Spill Prevention, Control, and Countermeasure rule of the Environmental Protection Agency against farmers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 29 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 29 proposed by Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 26.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 29 proposed by Senator Inhofe to Amendment SA 26.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 29 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
